applyIdentityBond(bytes32,uint256,bytes3.details: Applies an identity bond based on a signed PCI-Certificate

params.requestedBond: The bond amount suggested by the certificate
params.signature: The backend signature on (phoneHash, requestedBond, countryCode)

createRecoverySession(bytes32,address).details: Initiates a recovery session for an identity

params.identityHash: The hash of the identity to recover

params.phoneHash: The hashed phone number of the identity to delete

getGuardianCount(bytes32).details: Gets guardian count for an identity

getGuardians(bytes32).details: Gets all guardians for an identity

getIdentityByPhoneHash(bytes32).details: Gets an identity by phone hash

getIdentityMetadataHash(bytes32).details: Returns metadata hash for an identity.

params.phoneHash: The hashed phone number of the identity

getPhoneHash(address).details: Gets the phone hash associated with an address

identityExists(bytes32).details: Checks if an identity exists by phone hash

isGuardianActive(bytes32,address).details: Checks if a guardian is registered and active

isIdentityOwner(bytes32,address).details: Checks if an address is the owner of an identity (public version for GuardianRegistry)

joinResolverPool(bytes32,uint256).details: Joins the resolver pool for marketplace disputes

params.stakeAmount: Additional DAI to stake for resolver eligibility

registerGuardian(bytes32,address,bytes32.details: Registers a guardian for an identity

params.identityHash: The hash of the identity (phone hash)
params.publicKeyHash: The hash of the guardian's public key

removeGuardian(bytes32,address).details: Removes a guardian from an identity

params.guardianAddress: The address of the guardian to remove

submitAppeal(bytes32,string).details: Submits an appeal for a frozen identity

params.newStatus: The new status for the guardian

params.phoneHash: The hashed phone number of the identity to update

updateIdentityMetadataHash(bytes32,bytes.details: Update metadata hash for an identity (off-chain data integrity).

params.phoneHash: The hashed phone number of the identity

updateTrustLevel(bytes32,uint32).details: Updates the trust level of an identity
